title: UI Scaffold Integration

detailed_design.description: Integrate comprehensive UI scaffold from .temp/scaffold_unzipped/ into the main frontend. The scaffold provides a complete 'Command Center' UI with AppSidebar, PersonaSelector, ModelSelector, ChatInterface, StatusBar, SettingsPanel, and 40+ shadcn/ui components. Replace mock data with real backend API calls.
detailed_design.solution: Phase 1: Copy components, lib, hooks from scaffold. Phase 2: Merge layout.tsx and integrate AppSidebar. Phase 3: Replace mock data in lib/store.ts with API calls. Phase 4: Connect components to backend. Phase 5: Verify all features work.

acceptance_criteria: All scaffold components copied to frontend/src/components/
StatusBar shows real agent process data
All sidebars render correctly (Processes, Automations, Cron Jobs)
No mock data remains in production code

user_stories.story: As a user, I want a rich dashboard UI to manage my agent.
As a user, I want to switch between agent personas easily.
As a user, I want to monitor agent processes in real-time.
As a user, I want to manage automations and cron jobs through the UI.

technical_notes.current_issue: Monolithic single-page frontend, no component structure
